description: This Python source file defines a class FastEmbedEmbedder that utilizes the fastembed library to generate text embeddings using a specific model. It includes methods for obtaining embeddings and a placeholder for usage information, with dependencies on numpy and fastembed libraries.

classes.name: FastEmbedEmbedder
classes.description: A dataclass implementing an embedder that uses the BAAI/bge-small-en-v1.5 model for text embeddings.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates an embedding vector for the provided text using the fastembed TextEmbedding model.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Returns the embedding vector and usage information (currently None) for the provided text.
